descriptions:
["DescriptionLIVING CHOICE Real Estate is pleased to present Il Primo a 77 storey ultra-luxury residential building located next to the Opera House.
Featuring large apartments, either half or full-floor (4, 5 & 6 bedrooms). Upon completion, Il Primo will be the second tallest tower in Downtown Dubai. 
Il Primo apartments will be fitted out with some of the best materials from marble flooring to sleek wooden elements, elegant interiors and a modern plan and design. Some of Dubai's best views will be offered from apartments in Il Primo. 
Amenities
- Concierge
- Lobby
- Cigar Lounge 
- Games Room
- Library
- Movie Theatre
- Gym 
- Infinity Pool
Location-wise, this has probably one of the best locations in the city. 
1. Located in the heart of the new cultural district of Dubai - The Opera District. The Opera District is home to the 2,000 seating Opera House, which hosts numerous world-class and world-famous performances year-round. The Opera District will also feature five-star hotels and residences, waterfront promenades, retail plazas, parks, and pockets of green spaces. 
2. Located minutes away from the World's largest and busiest shopping malls - The Dubai Mall 
3. Located steps away from Burj Khalifa, a global icon, and the World's Tallest Tower.  
4. Located right on the Boulevard, which has numerous F&B outlets and restaurants.
Should one buy an apartment in Il Primo?
Feel free to contact us for more information , we are ready to listen, advise and guide you to find the best option for you.
LIVING CHOICE Real Estate is a RERA certified company whose primary business is to introduce a wide range of real estate brokerage services in Dubai's market. We believe that trust is the key of success, therefore we assure to always provide an outstanding service by putting our client’s interest first and guiding them through the whole process.
*Your Choice, Our Commitment*
www.livingchoice.ae"]
